itemDescription: British Anglican clergyman,academic and church builder

wikipedia_page.main: Revd Canon John Hensman (1780 – 1864) was a prominent nineteenth century Church of England clergyman, a Fellow of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge, and a prolific church builder.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Revd Canon John Hensman (1780–1864), Fellow of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge, and prolific church builder
